content.paragraph: We can expedite your application in as little as 1‚Äì14 days ‚Äî far faster than traditional government processing times of 5‚Äì7 weeks. Whether you need same-day service or a 2-week turnaround, we‚Äôve got you covered.

header.heading: Get In Touch With Us Today!

header.heading: How Our Visa & Passport Process Works
header.paragraph: Applying for a U.S. passport or visa doesn‚Äôt have to be stressful. We‚Äôve designed a simple, secure, and fast 3-step process to help you get your documents without the hassle of long lines or confusing paperwork.

steps.title:
Start Your
Application
paragraphs: Begin by completing our quick and secure online application form.
list: Enter your personal details, travel information, and any required background information.
Our system is designed to make the process simple, guiding you step by step.
You‚Äôll also receive a checklist of supporting documents needed for your application.
steps.final: üëâ This step usually takes just 10‚Äì15 minutes to complete.

steps.title:
Submit Your
Documents
paragraphs: Once your application is complete, upload or deliver your required documents for verification.
Our team reviews each submission carefully to ensure accuracy and compliance with all government requirements before proceeding to the next stage.

steps.title:
Receive Your
Passport or Visa
paragraphs: After approval, you‚Äôll receive your passport or visa quickly and securely ‚Äî either by mail or in person, depending on your preference.
We‚Äôll notify you at every stage so you know exactly when your documents are ready for collection.

contactUsServicesSection.heading: Contact Us for Various Chicago Passport Services
contactUsServicesSection.paragraph: Chicago Passport & Visa Services, registered with U.S. Passport Agencies under the name A Rush Passport & Visa Services, is a private company authorized to provide hand-carry commercial courier services for U.S. citizens in need of passports. From taking passport photos to assisting with document preparation, we offer a full suite of services designed to streamline the passport application process and support U.S. citizens in obtaining their passports quickly and securely.

ukEtaVisaPage.hero_description: The ETA is a fast online travel authorization required for travelers visiting the United Kingdom for tourism or business. It replaces the old paper-based system and is designed to improve border security while making travel easier for eligible visitors. Apply online in minutes and receive your approval by email.

list: Digital Passport Photograph - meeting e-visa (ETA) specifications

usPassportPage.title: Everything You Need for a US Passport
usPassportPage.description: We offer same-day passports, as well as passports in 3-5 days, 5-7 days, 7-10 days, 10-14 days, and 3-4 weeks.

image.alt: Image of a US Passport and travel documents

passportSections.title: New Passport
passportSections.description: Whether your passport expired or you‚Äôve never had a passport, everyone will need to apply for a new US passport at some point. For new US passport services in Chicago, choose Chicago Passport & Visa Services.

accordions.title: Requirements for First US Passport Application
accordions.text:
• You must be applying for the first time.
  • Your previous passport was issued more than 15 years ago.
  • Your previous passport was issued when you were under 16 years of age.

accordions.title: How to Apply
accordions.text:
DS-11 Online Application

  • Do not sign the application until instructed to do so.

accordions.title: Government & Service Fees
accordions.text:
• A personal check or money order made payable to the ‚ÄúUS Department of State‚Äù in the amount of $190.00.
  • If you are applying for a US passport with regular services, the check should be made out in the amount of $190.00. Follow this link for the state fee.
  • Temporary/starter checks or checks without a name or address will NOT be accepted.

Chicago Passport & Visa Services fees will be applied in addition to the government fees.

accordions.title: Additional Requirements for New US Passports
accordions.text: Passport Photos | Proof of US Citizenship | Proof of Identity | Letter of Authorization | Service Order Form | Must Appear in Person

passportSections.title: Passport Renewal
passportSections.description: Renew your passport in Chicago with Chicago Passport & Visa Services. We offer emergency and rush passport services, so if you‚Äôre looking to expedite your passport, we have all the same-day solutions for you.

accordions.title: Requirements for US Passport Renewal
accordions.text:
Your US Passport can only be renewed if ALL these conditions are met.

  • You still have your US passport in your possession.
  • Your previous US passport was issued when you were 16 years or over.
  • Your previous US passport was issued no more than 15 years ago.
  • Your US passport is undamaged.

accordions.title: How to Apply
accordions.text:
DS-82 Online Application
  • Do not sign the application until instructed to do so.

accordions.title: Changed Your Name Due to Marriage or Divorce?
accordions.text: In the event that you changed your name due to marriage or divorce, you will need to bring in a certified copy of your marriage certificate or a court decree that shows your name change.

accordions.title: Apply By Mail
accordions.text: If you are processing your passport application with rush or regular mail, fill out two letters of authorization and Service Order Forms and send it along with the required supporting documents.

accordions.title: Government & Services Fees
accordions.text:
• Personal check or money order made payable to the ‚ÄúUS Department of State‚Äù in the amount of $190.00.
  • If you are applying for a US passport with regular services, the check should be made out in the amount of $190.00. Follow this link for the state fee.
  • Temporary/starter checks or checks without a name or address will NOT be accepted.

Chicago Passport & Visa Services fees will be applied in addition to the government fees.

accordions.title: Additional Requirements for US Passport Renewals
accordions.text: Passport Photos | Proof of US Citizenship | Proof of Identity | Letter of Authorization | Service Order Form | Must Appear in Person

passportSections.title: Child Passport
passportSections.description: Since a child‚Äôs passport cannot be renewed, a minor will have to apply for a new one each time. If the child is 16 years or older, they can apply for a new adult passport.

accordions.title: Requirements for US Passport for Minors
accordions.text:
• Applicants must be under the age of 16.
  • All children, including newborns, must have their own passport.
  • An appearance by both parents and the minor at a passport acceptance office is required and is a mandatory step of your child‚Äôs passport order. If only one parent can appear, a special letter of consent (form DS-3053) must be completed and notarized along with the copy of the parent‚Äôs ID.

accordions.title: How to Apply
accordions.text:
DS-11 Online Application
  • Do not sign the application until instructed to do so.

accordions.title: Proof of Identity
accordions.text: • Both parents‚Äô driver‚Äôs licenses with photo or passport.

accordions.title: Government & Services Fees
accordions.text:
• A personal check or money order made payable to the ‚ÄúUS Department of State‚Äù in the amount of $160.00 (expedite processing).
  • If you are applying for a US passport with regular services, the check should be made out to the ‚ÄúUS Department of State‚Äù in the amount of $160.00. Follow this link for the state fee.
  • Temporary/starter checks or checks without name and address will NOT be accepted.

Chicago Passport & Visa Services fees will be applied in addition to the government fees.

accordions.title: Additional Requirements for US Passports for Children
accordions.text: Passport Photos | Proof of US Citizenship | Proof of Identity | Letter of Authorization | Service Order Form | Must Appear in Person

passportSections.title: Lost Passport
passportSections.description: If your passport is lost, stolen, or damaged, you should replace it quickly. Chicago Passport & Visa Services offers lost passport renewal solutions so you have a replacement passport in time for your next trip. Also, canceling a lost passport quickly ensures it can‚Äôt be used if it falls into the wrong hands.

accordions.title: Requirements to Replace a Passport (Lost/Stolen/Damaged)
accordions.text: Lost passports are considered by the passport agency to be very serious. The loss stays on your record, so we encourage you to make every effort to find your passport even after a new passport is issued. When, or if, you find the old passport, it is important to return both passports to the US Passport Service to have the lost passport removed from your record.

accordions.title: How to Apply
accordions.text:
DS-11 Online Application
  • Do not sign the application until instructed to do so.

accordions.title: Statement Regarding a Lost or Stolen Passport
accordions.text:
Applicant needs to submit a completed DS-64 Lost or Stolen Form.

  • You‚Äôll need to make sure you give details on your efforts to recover your lost passport.

accordions.title: Government & Service Fees
accordions.text:
• A personal check or money order made payable to the ‚ÄúUS Department of State‚Äù in the amount of $170.00.
  • If you are applying for a US passport with regular services, the check should be made out to the ‚ÄúUS Department of State‚Äù in the amount of $110.00.
  • Temporary/starter checks or checks without a name or address with NOT be accepted.

Chicago Passport & Visa Services fees will be applied in addition to the government fees.

accordions.title: Additional Requirements for Lost US Passports
accordions.text: Passport Photos | Proof of US Citizenship | Proof of Identity | Letter of Authorization | Service Order Form | Must Appear in Person

passportSections.title: Passport Name Change
passportSections.description: Passports must reflect the correct name of the passport holder. Therefore, it‚Äôs essential that you receive a new passport due to marriage, divorce, adoption, or other legal reasons from Chicago Passport & Visa Services.

accordions.title: Requirements for US Passport Name Change
accordions.text: In order to change the name on your passport, you must have an original court-ordered name change and an original marriage certificate or divorce decree. You must go through a US passport renewal process in order to change your name.

accordions.title: How to Apply
accordions.text:
DS-5504 Online Application
  • Do not sign the application until instructed to do so.

accordions.title: Original Court Documents
accordions.text: Please provide the original court document that changes your name. For example, marriage certificate, divorce, or legal name change document.

accordions.title: Changed Your Name Due to Marriage or Divorce?
accordions.text: In the event that you changed your name due to marriage or divorce, you will need to bring in a certified copy of your marriage certificate or a court decree that shows your name change.

accordions.title: Applying By Mail?
accordions.text: If you are processing your passport application with rush or regular mail, fill out two letters of authorization and Service Order Forms and send them along with the documents.

accordions.title: Government & Service Fees
accordions.text:
• A personal check or money order made payable to the ‚ÄúUS Department of State‚Äù in the amount of $170.00.
  • If you are applying for a US passport with regular services, the check should be made out to the ‚ÄúUS Department of State‚Äù in the amount of $110.00.
  • Temporary/starter checks or checks without a name or address will NOT be accepted.

Chicago Passport & Visa Services fees will be applied in addition to the government fees.

accordions.title: Additional Requirements for US Passport Name Change
accordions.text: Passport Photos | Proof of US Citizenship | Proof of Identity | Letter of Authorization | Service Order Form | Must Appear in Person

passportSections.title: Second Limited Passport
passportSections.description: US citizens are allowed to have two different passports: a normal 10-year passport and a second limited passport. Second limited passports allow holders to travel internationally while processing a US visa. With these specific passports, holders can also travel to countries that don‚Äôt allow entry to people to visit if their normal passport has stamps from enemy countries.

accordions.title: How to Apply
accordions.text:
DS-82 Online Application
  • Do not sign the application until instructed to do so.

accordions.title: Statement Regarding Second Limited Passport
accordions.text: • You must submit a completed and signed statement of second limited passport.

accordions.title: Business Letter
accordions.text: • If you are traveling on business and requesting a second limited passport, you must provide a valid reason for a second limited passport on company letterhead.

accordions.title: Government & Service Fees
accordions.text:
• A personal check or money order made payable to the ‚ÄúUS Department of State‚Äù in the amount of $170.00.
  • Temporary/starter checks or checks without a name or address will NOT be accepted.

Chicago Passport & Visa Services fees will be applied in addition to the government fees.

accordions.title: Additional Requirements for US Passport Name Change
accordions.text: Passport Photos | Proof of US Citizenship | Proof of Identity | Letter of Authorization | Service Order Form | Must Appear in Person

accordions.title: Passport Photos
accordions.text:
• Photo should be 2‚Äù x 2‚Äù on a white background.
  • Photo should not be older than one month.

accordions.title: Current US Passport
accordions.text:
• You must submit your current undamaged passport.
  • The expired passport will be returned to you along with the new passport.

accordions.title: Proof of US Citizenship
accordions.text:
Please provide an original or a certified copy of one of the following:

  • Certified birth certificate (long form, not abstract).
  • Consulate report of birth abroad certificate.
  • Naturalization Certificate.
  • A certified copy of birth certificate that has the registrar‚Äôs raised, embossed, impressed, or multicolored seal.

accordions.title: Proof of Identity
accordions.text:
Please provide an original or a certified copy of one of the following:

  • Valid driver‚Äôs license or state ID.
  • Government identification or valid military identification.

accordions.title: Letter of Authorization
accordions.text: • Fully completed letter of authorization to authorize Chicago Passport & Visa Services to do the service for you.

accordions.title: Service Order Form
accordions.text: • Please fill out the form and bring it to our office with all the required supporting documents.

accordions.title: Must Appear in Person
accordions.text: To apply for a new passport, you must come to our office in person. After completing all the required paperwork, you will be sent to a passport acceptance facility. There, they will put all your paperwork, including your check and original documents, in a sealed package and hand it back to you, which then needs to be dropped off at our office to start the process.
